TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Without it, the soup is bad!

Waiter! There's blood on my soup!

Don't include the new page, I put it myself on the soup. Don't charge it extra, though!

Waiter: That is not your soup. That is some blood pudding.

Customer: Do you have soup to help with a cold?

All of our soups! From the chicken noodle soup to the cat fur and sea urchin soup.

Waiter! Why is my soup fishy?

Waiter: It is a Bisque.

Customer: Is this cosmic soup?

No.

Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! There's a Waiter! In mysoup!

They wait for you to finish.

Waiter! My soup has a rotten egg!

Waiter: Is it not green enough for you?

Customer: Waiter there is a really tall building in my soup.

Oh, that was the cake for a customer a few blocks away. 

Waiter! Why is this kerbal drinking my soup?

Waiter: Because you are. You are sitting in front of a mirror.

Customer: There is never enough thyme.

Sorry but you eat some wild mushrooms. 

Waiter! There's a sniper rifle in my soup!

Waiter: It is pronounced sipper. It is for drinking your soup.

Customer: Waiter, what wafer is in my soup?

KitKat wafers. Chocoloate not extruded.

Waiter! A cat is mysteriously looking at me while I'm sipping my soup!

You should give some of your soup to them, he's quite hungry.

Waiter, this soup is literally a launch pad with a Vanguard TV-3 Launch Vehicle Fully Functional Replica on it! Should i stop the rocket from exploding?

Waiter: Depends on whether you wish to be covered in soup or not.

Customer: Waiter, this soup tastes like mint icecream, and it is yummy.

Because you eat our precious Minmus surface sample! 

Waiter! There's a cheater in my soup!

You'll need to have the cheaters on the other team kill those.
Waiter! There are updated localization files in my soup!

Edited March 6, 2022 by iamn00b

Sorry, but you just drink the KSP.

Waiter! There's a painting in my soup!

A piece of art! Enjoy. Here's your check.

Waiter! There's H2S on my soup and it smells bad!

Quick, consume that anti-poison pill! and throw away that soup to a safe place!

Waiter, there's a Kermit frog wandering on my soup!

How adorable!

Waiter! You gave me an argon soup - colorless, tasteless, and odorless!

Waiter: You could have just said we forgot to fill your bowl.

Customer: A refill please.

Here you are.  A Atomic Annie's cannon shell. Beware of it's radioactive. 

Waiter! Why's my soup full of poison? 

 

Edited March 7, 2022 by Abel101126

No. it is pronounced parsnip.

Customer: I think the other customer may be drunk.

No. Wait he is drunk! @ColdJ

Waiter! Why's my soup radioactive?

It has some Radon and Uranium. Beware!

Waiter! Why did you give me the periodic table instead of a soup?
